name: Seismitoad
description: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed in rain.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning the target with each hit.  This counts as an extra effect for the purposes of shield dust.  This ability takes effect before mummy.
abilities.description: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.effect: Whenever a water-type move hits this Pokémon, it heals for 1/4 of its maximum HP, negating any other effect on it.  Water moves will ignore this Pokémon's substitute.
